gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Pipelines in the United States, 2011

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Dataset represents locations of existing and proposed CO2 pipelines. Includes all interstate pipelines and major intrastate pipelines.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Locating Carbon Dioxide (CO2) pipelines in the United States.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Access is granted to Stanford University affiliates only. Affiliates are limited to current faculty, staff and students.

gmd:environmentDescription.gco:CharacterString: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: The accuracy of Rextag’s GIS Data varies per area and pipeline operator. In a study conducted from random locations in rural well as in urban areas in the US we overplayed our pipeline data on various high resolution area photography tiles to compare the centerline with the ROW “scars” on the ground. We then tallied the offset distances in feet per all the pipelines shown in that area. This exercise was repeated multiple times to reach a sample size of 1000.

gmx:name.gco:CharacterString: Feature Catalog for Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Pipelines

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Internal feature number.
Feature geometry.
Pipeline short name for labeling purposes
Full Pipeline Operator Name
Pipeline Owner Name
Name of the pipeline system
Diameter of pipe (If available) in inches
Pipeline designation type (Transmission)
If pipeline is an Interstate pipeline (Y) or not (N)
Not applicable
Pipeline Operational Status (Operational, Under Development, Abandoned)
Not applicable
State that this particular segment/pipe resides
State/County FIPS that this particular segment/pipe resides
Pipeline Commodity (CO2)
Specific Notes relating to the pipeline
Rextag Quality Check; Internal Use Only
Rextag’s GIS Zone name (Visit www.rextagstrategies.com for more information)
Pipeline segment length; calculated using the North America Equidistant Conic projection.
Country that this particular segment/pipe resides
Refers to the version number when the feature was last updated.
